nml_option.name: config_use_TEMPLATE
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member TEMPLATE is called.

nml_option.name: config_TEMPLATE_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_TEMPLATE_compute_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

package.name: amTemplate
package.description: This package includes variables required for the amTemplate analysis member.
